downloadTitle: Solution Development for HR Processes sample diagram for Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Help facilitate project collaboration and communication with this Visio 2010 solution development process sample diagram for human resources (HR).
detailsSection: Help facilitate project collaboration and communication with this Microsoft Visio 2010 solution development process sample diagram for human resources (HR). As Kimberly Garcia of Microsoft HR indicates, basic flowcharts can often help facilitate collaboration and communications on given projects. In this sample diagram, the overall project approach, including how and when to communicate anticipated challenges, is conveyed through an informative visualization that should be easy for stakeholders to understand. The sample diagram uses containers to group related process steps and data graphics to reveal likely communications events. You could modify the stages (containers), steps, and other elements of the process to fit your own solution development needs.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the sample diagram to your computer.
